newsitem.title: TUNISIA: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX EASES, OTC TRADE ACTIVE.
newsitem.headline: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX EASES, OTC TRADE ACTIVE.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Thursday closed down 0.09 percent in higher trade boosted by over-the-counter exchanges, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 444.97 points, down from 445.38 on Wednesday.
Total volume was 1.75 million dinars against 312,084 dinars over the previous session. Over-the-counter exchanges amounted to 1.19 million dinars.

Milk firm Societe Tunisienne de l'Industrie Laitiere fell 2.91 dinars, or 41 percent to 4.17 dinars with only 60 shares changing hands. Compagnie d'Assurances et de reassurances ASTREE slid 1.26 dinar to 20.36 dinars.
Chemical firm Alkimia was up 0.38 dinar to 42.5 dinars.
Banque de Developpement Economique de Tunisie rose 0.1 dinar to eight dinars.
